summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated July 30, 2019, outlining the reassignment of executive staff responsibilities effective August 5, 2019. The document is significant as it originates from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held at the time of his death.

events.title: Executive Staff Responsibilities Reassignment
events.description: Effective date for the reassignment of executive staff responsibilities at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is a Bureau of Prisons memorandum dated July 30, 2019.
It outlines a reassignment of executive staff responsibilities at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, effective August 5, 2019.
The memorandum originates from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated and died in August 2019.
